title: Ghetto Heaven
lyrics:
Paroles de la chanson Ghetto Heaven par Lisa Stansfield
You know I love my baby
My baby loves me
My day it gets so heavy
I need a little company

It's quarter to eleven
And it's time to make some ghetto heaven
Ghetto heaven
I need a little ghetto heaven

Nana likes brandy
Especially peach
She keeps it by the radio
And she listens to the reverend preach
It's ten o' seven
And time to get some ghetto heaven

Ghetto heaven
Just got to get some ghetto heaven
Ghetto heaven
She needs a little ghetto heaven

Baby baby baby
All I need in this world is you, yeah
And baby when you're gone
Baby baby baby
Your touch, your kiss always gets me through

Sister needs her sugar
To get her through the day
Mmmm she doesn't have the money
But always got a way to pay

It's two o' seven
It's time to sell some ghetto heaven

Ghetto heaven
It's time to sell some ghetto heaven
Ghetto heaven
Got to get some ghetto heaven

You know I love my baby, yeah
And my baby loves me
Oh my day it gets so heavy
I need a little company
It's quarter to eleven
I need a little ghetto heaven
Ghetto heaven

(A little ghetto heaven)

My baby loves me
Yeah yeah yeah
